replies.bodyText: From what I expect, all of the public class and methods would be commented on before this PR is reviewable.
replies.author: hanahmily

timeline.bodyText: There is another abstract Window in the OAP core. Please rename this.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Do you mean this one under prometheus package, that is going to be removed once OC/Prometheus switch the configuration modal to this one.
replies.author: hanahmily

replies.bodyText: No, in the core streaming. Window is for caching metrics and switching.
replies.author: wu-sheng
